title: Authorities say 1975 killing of 22-year-old N.H. woman has now been solved
author: Madison Lucchesi

Judith Lord.

title: Tufts warns students to avoid Somerville massage therapist
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News The university issued a no-trespass order on Friday, barring the therapist from campus.
Tufts University in Medford.

Scott Eisen Tufts University issued an advisory Friday warning students and staff to avoid Sam Peck, a massage therapist at Soarbody Therapeutics in Somerville, a practitioner many in the Tufts community have visited for years.

title: Braintree’s first MBTA Communities Act development advances toward approval
author: Annie Jonas
bullets: Local News The 752-unit apartment complex is the largest MBTA Communities Act development in the state, according to a town official.
Commuters ride the escalator up to the platform to wait for the T at the Redline Braintree T Station in Braintree, MA.

(Kayla Bartkowski for the Boston Globe) By Annie Jonas November 25, 2025 | 8:09 AM 2 minutes to read Braintree’s first development permitted under the MBTA Communities Act is moving forward in the approval process — and it is a record-breaking 3A project in Massachusetts so far, a town official told Boston.
